en: Now his pig has gained a lot of weight.

ngiemboon: Ná nkáb yɔ̀ɔn pɔ́ ntsèm ntsèm.
Anò ne ńgyáŋa mámbàŋa, á kwé pɔ́ ńtseme tseme.
en: When a man is angry, he dies while enduring it.
Squeeze the vegetable into the bag.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńnguɔ táʼ, n ge tsɛ gʉa pɔ́ nkáʼ.
en: I'm sick but I'll still go to the field.
one who takes something out of a fire or out of a pot
